MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH62 postcode area of Eastham, affecting properties in Delamere Avenue and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified an underground cable fault as well as damaged equipment on Delamere Avenue. Our engineers are still working with the emergency services onsite to restore power safely and we now expect your supply to be restored by 5am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:36am on 10th January
